EmailTemplate.name: 2019_NBAA_Keselowski_Invite.2019_NBAA_Keselowski_Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: An NBAA Invitation from Racing Champion Brad Keselowski
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hello,
I’m Brad Keselowski, championship NASCAR driver and business entrepreneur — both of which require a demanding travel schedule. This is why I own a business jet and fly the country with my chief pilot Joey Meier.
So when it was time to decide whether I should buy a new plane, Joey and I considered all the options for Checkered Flag Aviation.
In the end I thought, "Why would I buy a new airplane when the one I have completely fulfills the mission?" It made more sense to upgrade the one I have.
Joey and I invite you to learn why upgrading with Primus Elite made perfect business sense for me, and how this state-of-the-art cockpit makes Joey's piloting easier and safer.
Program: "Learn How Checkered Flag Aviation Wins with Primus Elite" Where: NBAA – Las Vegas Convention Center, Room #N256 Date: October 22, 2019 Time: 2:00 p.m. – 3:00 p.m.
I hope to see you there!
Brad Keselowski Two-time NASCAR Champion
RSVP NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_NBAA_Keselowski_Invite_2019_LandingPageForm.html]]>
Learn more about Honeywell NBAA 2019 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2019/10/nbaa?utm_medium=email&utm_source=email&utm_campaign=19_Americas_BGA_PrimusElite]]>
